Public Remarks: This is a beautiful, quaint property nestled along the banks of the Fraser River in one of the most scenic regions of British Columbia. Wildlife abounds on this 192-acre farm with robust populations of mule deer, black bears, moose and a growing herd of elk. Whether the property is used as a hobby farm, a recreational hunting/fishing property or to raise a family, the natural beauty of the landscape combined with the cozy residence will transport you back to a simpler time. The property features (approx.) 85 acres of productive hay land, gradual sloping hills enveloped with timber, sufficient fencing and pasture to raise cattle or horses and numerous outbuildings to house equipment, tools, vehicles and hay. Outbuildings include a 50'x60' barn/hay shed, a 30'x32' garage, a 15'x30' workshop.
Realtor Remarks: Please contact the Listing Realtor 24 hours prior to showing. Inclusion of farm equipment is negotiable.
